description:
First though, a brain within an electronic body, with a mind, maybe, a consciousness. Chappie is an action thriller about a sentient robot in a police state. It's the third feature by South African director Neill Blomkamp that blends sci-fi with social commentary. He began at home with the sharp apartheid satire of District 9, went into orbit with Matt Damon and Jodie Foster in Elysium and now this Chappie set once again in Johannesburg where robot cops have enforced a dramatic fall in crime figures. Perhaps most interesting aspect to the film is that it's the second one this year to deal with artificial intelligence. And like Ex Machina, it deals some narrative sympathy to the machine. The cliche of films about AI has always been that robots and computers will soon become smarter and inevitably more deadly than humans. But Neill Blomkamp believes humans have fundamentally misunderstood artificial intelligence.

"I mean, humans are interesting in that because we're really the smartest organism on the planet and we so dominantly take this like pedestal place, like we love to name stuff and categorise things and put things in little compartments. And we don't really get that in a sense, we're not really human, and upper primates aren't really upper primates, and no animal is really any one animal. It's part of something that started off as a single-cell organism that is speeding through a transitionary phase and creating different branches of evolution, sort of forks in the road, and making more and more and more variations of itself. And this one mutation, which is human, is the cleverest of all of them, but it's still just one of them." 

声明：音视频均来自互联网链接，仅供学习使用。本网站自身不存储、控制、修改被链接的内容。“沪江英语”高度重视知识产权保护。当如发现本网站发布的信息包含有侵犯其著作权的链接内容时，请联系我们，我们将依法采取措施移除相关内容或屏蔽相关链接。>>零基础直达流利生活口语班<<

title: 《超能查派》（有声）

description:
《英乐天天唱》是一档模仿唱歌类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语能力。主持人会在每期节目中选取好听的歌曲片段，并给出发音提示和模仿示例。喜欢听音乐的童鞋可要积极参与哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

The Ditty Bops是由Amanda Barrett 和 Abby Dewald 组成的.二人均来自加州,都是二十来岁,目前在L.A. 这两名女生组合,完全是在一种偶然的情况下形成的.被华纳兄弟唱片公司发掘后,在 L.A. 进行巡回演出,之后发行首张同名独立专辑The Ditty Bops.听过她们的音乐，你会发现难以置信的是,她们两个人的声音有如从同一个人的嘴中唱出。配合的实在太完美了!喜欢主音Amanda Barrett的完美嗓音，以及Abby DeWald毫无瑕疵的合唱。Amanda Barrett高挑美艳，Abby DeWald知性成稳。在我看来她们就是音乐世界里最般配的一对。Amanda Barrett和Abby DeWald实际上是在90年代后期于美国的纽约市相识的，但是那个时候她们还没有开始自己的音乐旅程。直到她们都回到了加洲才开始了他们的创作。她们两个人可以说是才华横溢。Amanda Barrett在组合中演奏飘琴和洋琴，而Abby DeWald则是担任了演奏吉他的角色。她们的音乐类型丰富多样，从乡村、流行到西方摇摆再到早期的人声爵士，而不论是哪种类型的音乐在她们的表演中又会渗透出The Ditty Bops独有的艺术味道。

Bye bye love
Bye bye happiness
Hello loneliness
I think I’m gonna cry
Bye bye love
Bye bye sweet caress
Hello emptiness
I feel like I could die
Bye bye my love, goodbye
There goes my baby
With someone new
She sure looks happy
I sure am blue
She was my baby
Till he stepped in
Goodbye to romance
That might have been

title: 英文歌曲天天唱：Bye Bye Love

description:
《英文天天写》是沪江社团一档写作类社刊，其目的在于提升大家的英语写作能力。每期节目主持人都会给出一个话题，积极参加的童鞋还会得到主持人的专业点评哦！想提高英语写作的童鞋千万不要错过哦！去沪江社团订阅本社刊！

     

话题：

Writing: imagine a scenario or express your opinion
Enthusiastic
Enthusiastic means to be excited and full of energy about something. Who is or are enthusiastic? What is the reason? What action does that lead to?
This week's topic: They were enthusiastic... (90-110 words)

Suggestions:
1) enthusiastic about traveling plans
2) preparing a meal enthusiastically
3) enthusiastic speech
4) enthusiastic dance routine
5) Instead of writing a scenario, feel free to comment on the story below.

范例1：

The discussion of the decorating project continued after the short, or not-so-short disturbance, just like before. It went without saying that the interior designer did not mention anything about the surveillance bugs he found. He doubted that the club manager knew about it. The atmosphere, though, seemed to have shifted slightly. After the phone call, the interior designer sensed that the manager seemed to be a bit tenser than before, and was not as enthusiastic about the discussion. The designer could sense that the meeting was coming to an end soon.

想要得到专业主持人的点评和意见吗？快来节目现场一试身手吧>>
